docs.lead_paragraph: A man lies on his back, with his feet in the air. Across the soles of his feet is laid a heavy pole, 15 feet long. Suspended in slings at the ends of the pole are a boy and a girl. The pole is made rapidly to revolve horizontally, with an upward and downward sweep, and the boy and girl wave flags as they whirl through the air.
